we: We're a group of young and passionate R&D Engineers based in Manila, Philippines and we like to build something together with you. We'll be here every step of the way, we'll help you realize what you actually need, what needs to be done and how to do it. We don't just build stuff, we give you the best value from our work.

When we're not working, we're deep in the lab, innovating, learning, experimenting, testing new technologies, and blogging our findings. It's in our blood. We build and learn. We've already found our passion, it's a blessing and we want to share it with you.
